courses.name: World of Dinosaurs
courses.description: Take an exciting journey to learn about the different types of dinosaurs and their history.
courses.youWillLearn: Build 16 web development projects for your portfolio, ready to apply for junior developer jobs.Learn the latest technologies, including Javascript, React, Node and even Web3 development.

comments.comment: A fun and educational course, perfect for my dinosaur-obsessed kid.
Great visuals and easy to understand for young children!

courses.name: Exploring the Solar System
courses.description: Learn about the planets, stars, and the wonders of space through exciting visuals and simple lessons.
courses.youWillLearn: Build 16 web development projects for your portfolio, ready to apply for junior developer jobs.Learn the latest technologies, including Javascript, React, Node and even Web3 development.

comments.comment: My son loved learning about space, the visuals were great!
The content was perfectly suited for my daughter’s age and very engaging.

courses.name: Animal Habitats

courses.youWillLearn: Build 16 web development projects for your portfolio, ready to apply for junior developer jobs.Learn the latest technologies, including Javascript, React, Node and even Web3 development.

comments.comment: My daughter enjoyed learning about animals and their homes.
A great educational experience with beautiful visuals!

courses.name: Coding with Scratch
courses.description: Learn basic coding concepts using Scratch, a visual programming language designed for kids.
courses.youWillLearn: Build 16 web development projects for your portfolio, ready to apply for junior developer jobs.Learn the latest technologies, including Javascript, React, Node and even Web3 development.

comments.comment: This course was a great way to introduce my son to coding in a fun way.
Scratch is a fantastic tool for teaching kids how to code, highly recommend!

courses.name: Building a Simple Website

courses.youWillLearn: Build 16 web development projects for your portfolio, ready to apply for junior developer jobs.Learn the latest technologies, including Javascript, React, Node and even Web3 development.

comments.comment: My son loved building his first website, and it was very easy to follow!
Great introduction to web development for kids.

comments.comment: My son had so much fun learning to program robots!
A really engaging way to introduce kids to robotics and programming.

Perfect for young kids who are curious about how things work.

Fun and educational, perfect for my son.

My daughter had so much fun building her bridge and learning about engineering!

testimonials.name: Rachel Adams
testimonials.comment: This platform has been a fantastic way for my children to learn in a fun and interactive manner. They especially enjoyed the coding and math courses!

testimonials.name: John Cooper
testimonials.comment: I’ve seen noticeable improvements in my son's problem-solving skills after taking the engineering and science courses. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Emily Johnson
testimonials.comment: The art and creativity courses are so engaging! My daughter spends hours drawing and creating, and she loves it.

events.name: Kids Coding Hackathon
events.brief: A fun and engaging coding event where children ages 8-12 can participate in coding challenges, collaborate with peers, and showcase their programming skills using Scratch.

events.name: Art & Craft Workshop: Build
events.brief: Children aged 5-9 can unleash their creativity in this workshop where they’ll design and create their own artistic collages using colorful materials.

events.name: Math Challenge Day: Puzzle Fun
events.brief: A day full of fun math puzzles and games for children aged 7-10. Boost their problem-solving skills while enjoying interactive math challenges.
